response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Our product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, tailored specifically to meet the needs of companies like yours.

Considering its immense potential impact on your business, we are offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $900,000. This represents a significant discount compared to the market value of $1,000,000, aimed at providing you with an exceptional return on investment.

Please let us know if this offer aligns with your financial planning and strategic objectives. We are confident that our product will contribute to your company's success and look forward to discussing how it can be integrated into your operations.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
